scripts.build: rimraf out && tsc --build src service-worker && rollup -c rollup.config.js && ln -sf index.html out/dist/404.html
scripts.start: tsc --build src service-worker && rollup -c rollup-start.config.js && concurrently -k -r "tsc --build src service-worker --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "rollup --watch -c rollup-start.config.js" "wds"
scripts.deploy-to-gh-pages: cd out/dist && echo ilmsfreeze.afq984.org > CNAME && git init -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m "npm run deploy-to-gh-pages" && git push --force git@github.com:afq984/ilmsfreeze gh-pages
